availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jackson County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Joyce Bailey Holcombe. Father of Henry Holcombe, Sarah Ann Holcombe, Dorcus Holcombe, John G. Holcombe, Jane Holcombe, James W. Holcombe, Mason W. Holcombe, and Laura D. Holcombe. Farmer in Jackson County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jackson County, My Division, p. 859.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jackson County, Sturgeon, p. 243B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 9580.
"Abner R. Holcombe (1809-1875)," Find A Grave, Memorial 5349569, accessed December 9, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/5349569.
